price: Na Dan kada se potkoljenica otkrije i kada budu pozvani da licem na tlo padnu, pa ne budu mogli.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُكۡشَفُ عَن سَاقٖ وَيُدۡعَوۡنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yawma yuk'shafu ʿan sāqin wayud'ʿawna ilā al-sujūdi falā yastaṭīʿūna
